page.title: 16DIET, SCHOOL MEALS, 1 WEEK
page.content: { MENU {Monday, 1st course, { }Savoury Mutton Nest,(minced meat 90g potato 180g) Sweetcorn 90g, Green Beans 120g, Gravy 100g, {2nd course, Krispy Short Cake 60g, Raspberry Sauce 45g. {Tuesday, 1st course,} Fish Fingers,(small oblongs of fish 90g) Saute potatoes 180g, Carrots 120g Peas 90g, {2nd course,} Gypsy Tart 45g, Ice Cream 90g. {Wednesday, 1st course, Roast Turkey 120g, Roast Potatoes 180g, Cabbage 120g, Carrots 120g. {2nd course, Lemon Gateaux 12{ {Thursday,}cont'd on page 17.
